SettingsItem.Name: PBK output resolution time unit
SettingsItem.Description: Time unit in which the output resolution of PBK model simulations is specified.

SettingsItem.Name: PBK output resolution step size
SettingsItem.Description: PBK model simulation output step size/length, specifying the evaluation resolution in terms of the step length (period) between two evaluations. For example, a step length of 12 with a resolution time unit of hours is interpreted as every 12 hours.
